Description: Part of a painted and stuccoed wooden plinth for a figure of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris(?); mortise at one end.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth (1906-1907)
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 217)
